1. Go to '...'
2. Upload file '...'
3. Click '...'
4. See error

What you expected to happen.

## Actual behavior

What actually happened. Include the full error message or traceback if available.

- OS: [e.g. Windows 11, Ubuntu 22.04, macOS 14]
